meanings.definition: Failure or refusal to recognize something.
meanings.sent1: The nonrecognition of his hard work was disheartening.
meanings.sent2: The nonrecognition of her talent was surprising to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The nonrecognition of the new student's achievements led to a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The nonrecognition of the problem was like ignoring a ticking time bomb.
meanings.sent5: The nonrecognition of his efforts left a lasting impact on his motivation.

meanings.sent1: The nonrecognition of her ideas made her feel undervalued.
meanings.sent2: The nonrecognition of his presence at the meeting was noticeable.
meanings.sent3: The nonrecognition of the cat's attempts to get attention was comical.
meanings.sent4: The nonrecognition of her achievements was a heavy weight on her self-esteem.
meanings.sent5: The nonrecognition of their friendship hurt more than expected.
